body:
I have one follower. What does this mean? Does this person see all my posts on their front page, regardless of where I posted it? Or does something else happen?

Since you can't post to your profile directly, I fail to see how this is a useful feature. (For the record, please do not add the ability to post directly to your profile.)
body_html:
I have one follower. What does this mean? Does this person see all my posts on their front page, regardless of where I posted it? Or does something else happen?

Since you can't post to your profile directly, I fail to see how this is a useful feature. (For the record, please do not add the ability to post directly to your profile.)

title: What is the purpose of following someone?

author.bio: I like big brains and I cannot lie.
author.bio_html: I like big brains and I cannot lie.

body:
I think that posts from people you follow show up in your feed even when they are from guilds that you have not joined.

@kek is that accurate?
